title: 508. Does the Crypto Crash Mean the Blockchain Is Over?
description: No. But now is a good time to sort out the potential from the hype. Whether you’re bullish, bearish, or just confused, we’re here to explain what the blockchain can do for you. (Part 1 of a series.)
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
